channel.title: 508 problem
channel.description:
Why does every time i try to run a 508 server it always says this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Could anyone help and help me through all the steps of fixing it thanks !

item.title: 508 problem
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m thinking it can’t find your server class.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 problem
item.dc:creator: @BrandonScape BrandonScape
item.description:
@BrandonScape wrote:

Why does every time i try to run a 508 server it always says this

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320)
Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .


Could anyone help and help me through all the steps of fixing it thanks !

Read full topic
